verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus Christ, the same today, yesterday, and forever.
The captain of our battle shall surely never fail.
He is raising up a Church that is made up of His body.
Against them the gates of Hell shall not prevail.
Chorus:
Blow ye the trumpet and sound an alarm in Zion.
The judgments of the Lord are surely neigh at hand.
Gather up. Gather up the stones out of the highway.
And prepare a pathway for the Son of Man.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
This army of the Lord is to rule with a rod of iron.
Subduing all nations with the power of His might.
We shall put them under foot. Then the kingdoms will
become, the kingdoms of our Lord and of His Christ.
